itunes:title: Doctrine & Covenants 89-92 Part 1 : Dr. Jed Woodworth
title: Doctrine & Covenants 89-92 Part 1 : Dr. Jed Woodworth
description:
What guiding truths that guide decision-making can you find in Section 89? Dr. Jed Woodworth opens up the Word of Wisdom and shows how the Lord rebukes without rebuking. Dr. Woodworth illustrates new historical relevance in a section that addresses more than health and clarifies spiritual truths in a groundbreaking section for health and obedience codes in the Christian world.

Shownotes: https://followhim.co/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel

"Let Zion in Her Beauty Rise" by Marshall McDonald
https://www.marshallmcdonaldmusic.com/products/let-zion-in-her-beauty-rise-piano

Please rate and review the podcast.
